taxPPro

Source: vignettes/taxPPro.Rmd
taxPPro.Rmd

An R package to propagate annotations for bugphyzz

Package installation 

if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install('sdgamboa/taxPPro')

Propagate categorical attribute values 

library(taxPPro)
library(bugphyzz)

Import data 

aer <- physiologies('aerophilicity')[[1]]
table(aer$Evidence)
#> 
#>     exp     igc unknown 
#>    1253    5076    5141

Propagate upstream with ancestral state reconstruction (ASR) 

aer_asr <- propagate(aer, max.tax.level = 'genus', direction = 'upstream')
table(aer_asr$Evidence)
#> 
#>     asr     exp     igc unknown 
#>    1060    1224    1370    4994

Propagate downstream with inheritance 

aer_inh <- propagate(aer, max.tax.level = 'genus', direction = 'downstream')
table(aer_inh$Evidence)
#> 
#>     exp     igc     inh unknown 
#>    1224    1370   46334    4994

Propagate with both ASR and inheritance 

aer_prop <- propagate(aer, max.tax.level = 'genus', direction = 'both')
table(aer_prop$Evidence)
#> 
#>     asr     exp     igc     inh unknown 
#>    1060    1224    1370   56838    4994

Propagate an attribute with continous values 

ph <- physiologies('optimal ph')[[1]]
table(ph$Evidence)
#> 
#> exp 
#> 886

upstream 

ph_upstream <- propagate(ph, 'genus', 'upstream')
table(ph_upstream$Evidence)
#> 
#> asr exp 
#> 730 876

downstream 

ph_downstream <- propagate(ph, 'genus', 'downstream')
table(ph_downstream$Evidence)
#> 
#>   exp   inh 
#>   876 10077

ASR + Inheritance 

ph_prop <- propagate(ph, 'genus', 'both')
table(ph_prop$Evidence)
#> 
#>   asr   exp   inh 
#>   730   876 52539
